titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7060) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide incentives for energy production and conservation, to extend certain expiring provisions, to provide individual income tax relief, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7060) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide incentives for energy production and conservation, to extend certain expiring provisions, to provide individual income tax relief, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-887, by Mr. Arcuri.
Waives all points of order against consideration of the bill except those arising under clause 10 for rule XXI.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 278.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1502.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.Res. 1502, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the nays had prevailed. Mr. Arcuri demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question on H.Res. 1502 until a time to be determined.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 206 - 186 (Roll no. 645).

vote.text: Passed/agreed to in House: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215 - 188 (Roll no. 646).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215 - 188 (Roll no. 646).

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7060) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide incentives for energy production and conservation, to extend certain expiring provisions, to provide individual income tax relief.
